name: 100,000 Steps
text: After gaining the final damage bonus from the Walking Arsenal Key Passive, you automatically cast Ground Stomp and gain # Fury. This cannot happen more than once every 15 seconds

name: Accelerating Aspect

name: Aspect of The Aftershock
